title: Polonex
author: Polonex
created_time: January 11, 2023, 11:57:27 PMLast edit: March 15, 2023, 08:44:17 PM by Polonex
content: Selling OpenAI's ChatGPT starter template, this starter kit is made for demo and use purposes as a way to kickstart your own project or Software as a Service using ChatGPT.>> BUY NOW ($99)The price is $99 in BTC, ETH or other crypto accepted.Starter kit comes with ready to go frontend web interface and backend with a database, includes:DocumentationLogin / SignupAuthenticationPrompts and ToolsBackend DatabaseFrontend ReactJSNodeJS project under Express using API'sStyling uses TailwindcssAPI uses Express with JWTStripe is pre-configured if you want to include billingCredit calculator implemented on token usageScreen of code and website: https://imgur.com/a/2FVIA5v

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: OP you need to be on the Jr member rank at least to post images and your provided link is not BBcode so you need to obtain BBcode to show images on the thread I can do that for you.You can do it better.You can use Imgur to obtain BB code as well.Quote

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: So this is just a frontend to make an OpenAI lookalike, or you also have the neural network too (considering that you also wrote "Backend" in the title)?If so, it would be much more valuable than $250. But in the case that you don't, I guess this could make a decent frontend to access some open-source AI like PaLM-RLHF (assuming you manage to find the training data from somewhere).
